accountId().details: This function MUST return a string in the format "vendor.account.semver". The vendor and account names MUST NOT contain a period character.

params.target: The target address for the account to call.
params.value: The value to send with the call.

returns._0: The return data from the call.

executeBatch((address,uint256,bytes)[]).details: If the target is a module, the call SHOULD revert. If any of the calls revert, the entire batch MUST revert.

returns._0: An array containing the return data from the calls.

params.authorization: The authorization data to use for the call. The first 24 bytes is a ModuleEntity which specifies which runtime validation to use, and the rest is sent as a parameter to runtime validation.
params.data: The calldata to send to the account.

params.installData: Optional data to be used by the account to handle the initial execution setup. Data encoding is implementation-specific.
params.manifest: the manifest describing functions to install.

installValidation(bytes25,bytes4[],bytes.details: This does not validate anything against the manifest - the caller must ensure validity.

params.hooks: Optional hooks to install and associate with the validation function. Data encoding is implementation-specific.
params.installData: Optional data to be used by the account to handle the initial validation setup. Data encoding is implementation-specific.
params.selectors: The selectors to install the validation function for.
params.validationConfig: The validation function to install, along with configuration flags.

params.manifest: the manifest describing functions to uninstall.
params.uninstallData: Optional data to be used by the account to handle the execution uninstallation. Data encoding is implementation-specific.

params.hookUninstallData: Optional data to be used by the account to handle hook uninstallation. Data encoding is implementation-specific.
params.uninstallData: Optional data to be used by the account to handle the validation uninstallation. Data encoding is implementation-specific.

accountId().notice: Return a unique identifier for the account implementation.

executeWithRuntimeValidation(bytes,bytes.notice: Execute a call using the specified runtime validation.

installExecution(address,((bytes4,bool,b.notice: Install a module to the modular account.

installValidation(bytes25,bytes4[],bytes.notice: Installs a validation function across a set of execution selectors, and optionally mark it as a global validation function.

uninstallExecution(address,((bytes4,bool.notice: Uninstall a module from the modular account.

uninstallValidation(bytes24,bytes,bytes[.notice: Uninstall a validation function from a set of execution selectors.
